text: haey chaur anak( mou ham meat) leuk cheauteahar dl puokke ampi karorsanow knong lokey nih ku brieb dauchchea tukaphlieng del yeung ban banhchouh pileu mekh haey roukkhcheate kaban doh chenh mk chamrouh knea daoy sar tukaphlieng noh . kraoyomk vea kaban bre klaytowchea snguot del trauv khyalbk baok vineasa a nd reay towvinh . haey a l laoh mean anoupheap towleu avei teangoasa
